title: Greatclubs
content:
Greatclubs in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Greatclubs are Two-Handed Simple Weapons in BG3 that can only be two-handed, dealing 1-8 Damage without enchantments. They have a range of 1.5m, and they deal Bludgeoning Damage

Many Greatclubs have unique properties, so you should read carefully what these do, and many also have Weapon Actions that can only be used if you are Proficient with Greatclubs in
